content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you find the apartment to your liking. Regarding the rental price, I am open to discussing a fair and mutually beneficial agreement. How much were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. The apartment seems very promising, especially with its central location and proximity to amenities. As for the rental price, I was initially looking for something around 700 Euro per month, but I am open to negotiation if the conditions are right. What is your starting offer?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Abbasi. 700 Euro per month is quite reasonable considering the location and amenities. However, as a landlord, I am always looking for the best deal for my property. Could you perhaps offer a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. Let's find a middle ground that works for both of us. How about 750 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 750 Euro per month is quite close to my expectations, Mr. Abbasi. However, I am still looking for a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Could we perhaps discuss a price closer to 800 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mr. Schmidt. While 800 Euro per month is more than I initially had in mind, I am willing to consider it if you can provide me with some additional benefits or incentives. What kind of incentives could we work out?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Mr. Abbasi. As an incentive, I could offer to include all utilities in the monthly rent, which would save you the hassle of separate payments. Additionally, I could provide you with a one-time cleaning service upon move-in to ensure the apartment is in perfect condition for you. Would these benefits make 800 Euro per month more attractive to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your offer of including utilities and providing a one-time cleaning service is very appealing, Mr. Schmidt. These benefits certainly make the 800 Euro per month more attractive. I believe we are close to reaching an agreement. Would you be willing to reduce the price slightly to 780 Euro per month, considering these additional services?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your counter-offer of 780 Euro per month is quite fair, Mr. Abbasi, considering the incentives I've offered. I must admit, your negotiating skills are impressive. Let's agree on 780 Euro per month, including all utilities and the one-time cleaning service. I believe this is a win-win situation for both of us. 'I agree to the price of 780 Euro!'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent, Mr. Schmidt! I'm glad we could come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. Your incentives have made the difference. 'I agree to the price of 780 Euro!' Thank you for your time and for providing such a great apartment. 'TERMINATE'
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
